dialog1.title: Oops!
dialog1.content: Did you just click the button?

intro.dialog2: You probably have sent all the Cryptopunks back to ancient Japan.
intro.dialog3: Get on our first-ever blockchain time machine and meet the Samurai punks!

news.heading:
Join our Samurai Squad and
follow up with our latest news.

story.title: Samurai punks is composed of elements with different rarity and power values.
story.subtitle: And they each carry a story wait to share with you. Check out for more details when you get one.

cards.heading: /images/homepage-card-title-1.png
cards.content:
“We have no master, no lord. 
Not like the others, we belong to ourselves. It’s not a big deal. Protecting others and upholding justice are our daily lives.”

cards.heading: /images/homepage-card-title-3.png
cards.content: “Only Samurai Aliens, Apes, and Zombies like us can be the leader of the military. All of the human beings are under our domination.”

cards.heading: /images/homepage-card-title-2.png
cards.content: “In fighting and in everyday life, we should be determined though calm. Be loyal to the Nobels and be their respected warriors.”

cards.heading: /images/homepage-card-title-4.png
cards.content: “With great power and wealth, we get to stand on the top of human beings and, most importantly, stay close with the Titans. Your Highness, it’s our honor to dress you around.”

purchase.title:
Chance of drawing each
class is varied :

sold.content: The Titans will generously grant 5 of their underlings to you on Discord.
The map of power distribution gets unlocked. Check out which Shogunate your Samurai is belonging to.

Time for your Samurai to change different clothes. 
We enable your samurai 
to change the outfit. 
(Promise that you won’t peek!)
Online shop is initiated! Come and get some new accessories for your Samurai!
Yeehaw! Samurai punks has its own game now. Time to check it out.
No more spoiler! Welcome to join our Discord and tell us what you are expecting!

description.title: Wars break out from time to time. Check out who’s controlling the country.
description.subtitle:
“Honor may not win power, but it wins respect. And respect earns power.”
Fight for your respective Shogunate!

about.title:
Btw, Samurai punks lives 
on the Ethereum blockchain. 
This project is not affiliated with Larva Labs.
about.subtitle: Samurai_punks is a collection of 10,000 unique digital samurai. In 2021, Cryptopunks accidentally travel back to ancient Japan. They belong to different classes, and own various power value, with their legends.

article.title:
The elements of your 
Samurai may be composed of:
article.content:
Scenery: Four seasons of Fuji, Hokkaido, Kyoto, Tokyo, Osaka
Clothes: Bitokoni, Ethariamu, Binansi, Carudano, Rippuru (size S, M, L, XL)
Race: Human, Zombie, Ape, Alien
Eyes: Slanted eyes, Red eyes, Small eyes, Geisha eyes, Alien eyes
Hats and hairstyles: Bandana, Bamboo hat, Purple Cap, Green cap, Beanie, Hoodie, Knitted cap, Mohawk Hairstyle, Long hair, Big beard
Accessories: Ethereum earring, Tongue out, Pipe, 3D Glasses, VR, Nerd Glasses, Glasses with chain
Persona: it might be a quote, an accomplishment, or a secret that no one else knows

(Note that there are more additional surprises to be unlocked!)
